titles.title: Health Centers Renewal Act of 2006
Health Centers Renewal Act of 2006
Health Centers Renewal Act of 2006
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide additional authorizations of appropriations for the health centers program under section 330 of such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 109-509.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 285.

action.text: Mr. Deal (GA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5573.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 424 - 3 (Roll no. 306).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 6/21/2006--Passed House without amendment. Health Centers Renewal Act of 2006 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY2007-FY2011 for health centers to meet the health care needs of medically underserved populations.
